name: God's Gift --- Kickstarter Demo
description:
If you like this demo please consider pledging to our Kickstarter HERE

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/268919490/gods-gift

God's Gift is a Lovecraft & Lemmings inspired 2D puzzle platformer with an emphasis on forward planning, exploration and experimentation. Overcoming environmental and enemy based puzzles by mutating your cultists giving them many fantastic eldritch abilities.

Demo Features:

* 5 complete levels

* A tough boss level

* 9 Mutations to experiment with

* Existential horror
